fast_recipe_ingredients.number_five: ½ cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus more for garnish

fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Add the polenta to salted boiling water
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Simmer until the polenta is slightly thick
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Cover and continue cooking until the polenta is very thick
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: Stir in the butter and cheese

second_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Cook sausage, ground beef, onion, and garlic in a Dutch oven over medium heat until well browned.
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes.
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: To assemble, spread 1 1/2 cups of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking dish.

third_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Place a rack in middle of oven; preheat to 450°.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Wash, peel, and trim 3 medium carrots. Cut in half (or in quarters lengthwise if they’re large), then cut crosswise into pieces.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Chop 2 celery stalks crosswise into pieces. Add to bowl with the rest of the mirepoix.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: Smash and peel 8 garlic cloves with the back of your knife. If any of them are left more or less intact after that initial smashing, give them another good wack with the back of your knife so they really open up and start to break apart. Add to bowl, also.

description: Wednesday, August 24, 2022 | Tag Cloud Tags: Biden, EU, Euro, Europe, Joe Biden, Military, News, Russia, Security, UK, Ukraine, United States, Worthy News (Worthy News) – U.S. President Joe Biden has announced nearly $3 billion in new U.S. military aid for Kyiv as Ukraine marked its independence day six months after Russia invaded the country.'The United States of America is committed to supporting the people of Ukraine as they continue the fight to defend their sovereignty. As part of that commitment, I am proud to announce our biggest tranche of security assistance to date: approximately $2.

fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: cook the tortellini according to the package directions. Then drain well and cool in a very large bowl in the fridge
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: While the tortellini is cooking, slice the summer squash and the zucchini into 1/4-inch rounds and then quarter the rounds
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Slice the cherry tomatoes in half. Slice the red onion in 1/4 inch half moons and soak it in cold water to dull its sharp flavor
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: Once the tortellini has cooled, top it with the cherry tomatoes, red onion, baby spinach, and sliced black olives.

second_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil; add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, cool, and mash with a fork or potato masher.
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Combine 1 cup mashed potato, flour, and egg in a large bowl. Knead until dough forms a ball. Shape small portions of the dough into long snakes. On a floured surface, cut snakes into 1/2-inch pieces.
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Drop in gnocchi and cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until gnocchi have risen to the top; drain and serve.

third_recipe_ingredients.number_two: 1/2 cup of extra virgin olive oil
third_recipe_ingredients.number_three: 70 g (3/4 cup) of Parmigiano Reggiano or Grana Padano
third_recipe_ingredients.number_four: 30 g (2 tablespoons) of Pecorino Fiore Sardo

third_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: the blades and the bowl of the food processor. Put them into the refrigerator for about 10 minutes until the tools are very cold.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Now dry the leaves very well on a kitchen towel (important: the basil leaves must be very dry)
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Chop the ingredients coarsely for a few seconds. Then add salt and Pecorino Fiore Sardo cheese cut into small pieces
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: Before seasoning your pasta dish, if the pesto is too thick, add 1 or 2 tablespoons of the cooking water

fast_recipe_ingredients.number_five: 1 small wedge of Parmesan with rind

fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: cut 1 large onion in half through root. Peel and discard skins. Finely chop and transfer to a medium bowl.
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Wash, peel, and trim 3 medium carrots. Cut in half (or in quarters lengthwise if they’re large), then cut crosswise into  pieces.
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Chop 2 celery stalks crosswise into ½ pieces. Add to bowl with the rest of the mirepoix.
fast_recipe_cooking_method.number_four: Smash and peel 8 garlic cloves with the back of your knife. If any of them are left more or less intact after that initial smashing, give them another good wack with the back of your knife so they really open up and start to break apart. Add to bowl, also.

second_recipe_ingredients.number_two: 6 tablespoons (3/4 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
second_recipe_ingredients.number_five: 1 1-pound loaf crusty Italian or French bread, cutinto 2-inch sections

second_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Blend oil, butter, anchovies and garlic in processor until smooth. Transfer oil mixture to heavy medium saucepan. Cook over low heat 15 minutes, stirring, occasionally. (Sauce will separate.) Season with salt and pepper.
second_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Pour sauce into fondue pot or other flameproof casserole. Set pot over alcohol burner or gas table burner to keep warm. Serve with vegetables and bread.

third_recipe_ingredients.number_two: 4 tbsp sun-dried tomato pesto I used Scala or Delallo in the US
third_recipe_ingredients.number_four: 4 basil leaves or ½ tsp dried basil

third_recipe_cooking_method.number_one: Set a large pot of salted water boiling and cook the tortelloni according to package instructions.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_two: Meanwhile in a large and deep pan heat the sun-dried tomato pesto together with minced garlic over low heat and fry while stirring for no longer than 30 seconds.
third_recipe_cooking_method.number_three: Drain the tortelloni while reserving ½ cup of pasta water. Add the tortelloni directly to the sauce and toss gently to combine.
